title: Drawing, "Stage Design:  Bridge Set for "Flower Drum Song"", ca. 1958
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, watercolor on illustration board
signed: Signed in pen and black ink at lower right:  Oliver Smith
inscribed:
Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower left:  Flower Drum Song.
Inscribed in graphite across lower margin:  DT. White 2 1/2 all;  and in green graphite across lower margin:  PLEASE COVER CELLOPHANE SKETCH
Inscribed in graphite on verso:  "Flower Drum Song"/ OPAQUE 2 1/2' from bottom/ TRANSLUCENT SEAMLESS MUSLIN/ KEEP ALL drawing - very fine/ PAINT EXACTLY LIKE SKETCH.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Stage Design:  Bridge Set for "Flower Drum Song"", ca. 1958.
ca. 1958. Graphite, pen and black ink, watercolor on illustration board. Gift of Oliver Smith. 1969-171-8.
